entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 2.1°C
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: SSW 44 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 13 inland. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
